topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f77da06368723311950800#post_54f77da06368723311950800
[bq="Number1pegasus"]"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f77cd363687232acc10700#post_54f77cd363687232acc10700
This, This is exactly.

And that goes for any animal. Its like they are a part of your family, you wouldn't put a limit on how many children you can have in one house would you? NO.

So then why with my pets? [/bq]
Probably because:

One, economic reasons.
The care and food for a family that have two dogs or more tends to be very expensive, especially the food. 

Two, lack of responsability and care.
Why a family would have a dog if no one cares about it? 
You only give him food, and that's it. Nothing else.
